turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you order a pizza for carryout?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Which place are you thinking?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do Pizza Hut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yep, what are we ordering? Medium cheese pizza as usual?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, we're having a party in about an hour, so will probably need 2 large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's awesome. Let me start an order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So do you want hand-tossed or pan pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go with hand-tossed for both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds great. Both large, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want anything else? Maybe a diet Pepsi or something like that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have Coke or only Pepsi, I forget?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have Pepsi, Mtn Dew, Root Beer. No Coke, unfortunately.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's just get the pizzas then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. You want to pick up the pizzas at the Pizza Hut near your home or near your work?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Near our house, the one on Cattleman Rd.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got you. Okay, your order is placed and will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Thanks a lot!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, have fun at your party!
